Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class roboptim::retargeting::LaplacianCoordinateChoreonoid< T >

Laplacian Coordinate of all markers of one frame.

for N markers, respectively at position (x0, y0, z0), ..., (xN, yN, zN)

Input: x = [ x0, y0, z0, ... xN, yN, zN ]

Output: f(x) = [ x0, y0, z0, ... xN, yN, zN ]

Template Parameters:
TFunction traits type
